azurerm_data_lake_store.description: Manages an Azure Data Lake Store.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Lake Store. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Has to be between 3 to 24 characters.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Data Lake Store.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tier.description: The monthly commitment tier for Data Lake Store. Accepted values are `Consumption`, `Commitment_1TB`, `Commitment_10TB`, `Commitment_100TB`, `Commitment_500TB`, `Commitment_1PB` or `Commitment_5PB`.

encryption_state.description: Is Encryption enabled on this Data Lake Store Account? Possible values are `Enabled` or `Disabled`. Defaults to `Enabled`.

encryption_type.description: The Encryption Type used for this Data Lake Store Account. Currently can be set to `ServiceManaged` when `encryption_state` is `Enabled` - and must be a blank string when it's Disabled.
encryption_type.notes: Support for User Managed encryption will be supported in the future once a bug in the API is fixed.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Data Lake Store.

endpoint.description: The Endpoint for the Data Lake Store.

create.description: Used when creating the Data Lake Store.

update.description: Used when updating the Data Lake Store.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Data Lake Store.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Data Lake Store.
